parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake hose can cause the brakes to become inoperable, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Vibrations in the front end of the vehicle
brake pedal goes to the floor.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS system can cause the wheels to lock up, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Shimmying or vibrating when brakes are applied
wheels lock up on wet roads

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pedal can cause the brakes to become inoperable, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Brake pedal goes to the floor
brake pedal feels soft or spongy
brake pedal does not return to its normal position.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake caliper can cause the brakes to become inoperable, leading to accidents or loss of control.
The failure of the wheel lug can cause the wheel to come off, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Right-side wheel lugs were stripped off completely
entire wheel and brake system came off.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the spark plug threads can cause the spark plug to blow out of the cylinder head, leading to engine damage, fire, and potentially life-threatening accidents.
symptoms: Spark plug blows out of the cylinder head
loud banging noise from the engine

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective exhaust system can cause noise, vibration, and exhaust fumes to enter the vehicle, potentially leading to carbon monoxide poisoning and other health risks.
The failure of the clutch fan and thermostat can cause engine overheating, leading to engine damage and potentially life-threatening accidents.
Tire delamination and failure can cause loss of control, accidents, and damage to the vehicle, potentially leading to injuries or fatalities.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Poor Customer Service and Recall Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Inadequate customer service and recall issues can lead to frustration, wasted time, and potentially, accidents or injuries due to unresolved tire problems.
symptoms: and inconsistent diagnosis of tire problems.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Valve stem failure can cause tire blowouts, loss of air pressure, and accidents, potentially leading to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: often occurring suddenly and without warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the heater blend door can cause a loss of front heat and defrost, leading to reduced visibility and a potential safety hazard, especially during cold weather.
symptoms: cold air produced through the front heater

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The distorted rear view mirror can cause objects to appear further away than they actually are, leading to a potential safety hazard, especially when changing lanes or parking.
symptoms: Objects appear further away than they are in the rear view mirror.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear windshield wiper can reduce visibility, especially during inclement weather, leading to a potential safety hazard.
symptoms: Rear windshield wiper fails to operate.
